forecaster.forecast.income module¶

Provides an IncomeForecast class for use by Forecast.

class forecaster.forecast.income.IncomeForecast(initial_year, people, asset_sale_timing=None)[source]¶

Bases: forecaster.forecast.subforecast.SubForecast

A forecast of income over the years.

Parameters

  • initial_year (int) – The first year of the forecast.

  • people (Iterable[Person]) –

    The people for whom the financial forecast is being generated. Typically a single person or a person and their spouse.

    Note that all Person objects must have the same this_year attribute, as must their various accounts.

  • asset_sale_timing (Timing) – The timing of asset sales. Optional.

asset_sale¶

The proceeds from a sale of property. TODO: Determine if asset sale belongs here or elsewhere.

Type

Money

carryover¶

Money carried over from last year to the current year.

Type

Money

gross_income¶

Total income for all plannees for the year, before taxes.

Type

Money

tax_withheld¶

Total tax withheld on plannees’ income at source.

Type

Money

net_income¶

Total income for all plannees for the year, net of taxes.

Type

Money
